name: Orgonic Living
description:
This game was nearly submitted to the Peanut Butter Jam in a very unfinished state (after only 30 minutes of work) before I decided to use this project for the Narrative Jam 2020 occurring concurrently to which it was finally submitted.

Inspired by Yōji Kuri's "Midnight Parasites" (1972) and Outlands' NORTH.

"Working is no problem as long as I can keep my mind".
